Title: Provides for a personal income tax credit for ten percent of the cost of long term health care insurance premiums
Summary: Provides taxpayers 55 years of age or over with a personal income tax credit in an amount equal to 10% of the annual premium paid for a long term health care insurance contract.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing a tax credit for individuals who purchase long term health insurance policies
